name: Sheep's Best Friend
description:
Show courage and cleverness by accepting the responsibility of a herding dog and leading your herd of sheep past dangerous forest tracks, over obstacles until you reach the new paddock. Can you find enough calmness and endurance to face this challenge? Take a deep breath and start your journey as "Sheep's Best Friend".

Controls

The game is controlled only by the mouse. Click or hold the left mouse button to command the herding dog.

Basic Gameplay

You start with your sheep herd at the beginning of the level. Guide them to the second fence paddock at the end of the map to finish the game. Try to hold as many sheep's as possible on your journey. Close the gate of a paddock/fence to finish the level.
